5da4848c2e9bba3ebc30a603.name: fivetwo_cuttingboard_rc
5da4848c2e9bba3ebc30a603.content_html:
The Cutting Board That Started It All
Our very first Five Two product sold out in three days, and soon, it'll be back like you've never seen it: the double-sided cutting board, brand-new in bamboo. You couldn't say enough good things about bamboo: It's eco-friendly, antimicrobial, and water-resistant—the ultimate work surface. Preorder now, so you'll be sure to get yours.
preorder NOW

5db1e82452f90861990fea56.name: fivetwo_knives_rc
5db1e82452f90861990fea56.content_html:
The Only Three You'll Ever Need
Our mission: Create a set of super-sharp, high-quality knives that work like a dream and look…well, even better. With 4,500 community members, we did it (and at a price you'll like, too). Get ready to meet these modern essentials.
Shop Now

All Your Registries In One Place

You might need a way to manage multiple registries—Blueprint Registry is here to help! Blueprint keeps all your registries in one place (including ours). Add gifts from any retailer, import existing registries, *and* create a honeymoon fund. It's all your registries in a more perfect union.
Visit BluePrint

5d9759942e9bba08d409b0bb.content_html:
Dinner is Served (Breakfast & Lunch, Too)
We’re bringing something special to the table: Five Two dinnerware and serveware, made to mix and match (and mingle with your existing pieces).
preorder NOW

5d9e269752f908552674a0f7.name: fivetwo_introducingfivetwo
5d9e269752f908552674a0f7.content_html:
We’re on a mission to reimagine every room in the house and remake everything in it. Let's do it…together.
Learn More

5cc08745071eff4dfe3e01ee.name: fivetwo_siliconestraws_rc
5cc08745071eff4dfe3e01ee.content_html:
Sip Happy, Sip Smart
You’ve been making moves to live eco-friendlier for years. One change we hear especially loud and clear? You're cutting back on single-use plastic. That’s why we designed these reusable Five Two Silicone Straws. They’re a practical, doable-for-everyday change.
shop NOW

5c702a7c071eff2edb610d10.name: fivetwo_woodenspoons_presale_rc
5c702a7c071eff2edb610d10.content_html:
Preorder Our Wooden Spoons
They're almost here! After getting your input on what makes a good spoon great, we spent months testing and refining our prototypes—and soon, our Wooden Spoons will be ready to ship. Preorder today so you can be sure to get yours as soon as they’re available.
PREORDER NOW

Chicken is Always a Winner
Get ready for 60 brand-new ways to love your favorite bird: Inside this clever collection by Food52 and chef Tyler Kord, you'll find everything from lightning-quick weeknight dinners to the coziest of comfort foods.
preorder now

something worth sharing

When you invite your friends to the Food52 Shop, everybody wins: You’ll both get a $20 credit when they make their first $50 purchase.*
Send 'em our way
 
*Get $20 in shop credit when your friends create a Food52 account and make their first purchase of $50 or more via your personal link. All credits are subject to review and approval per our terms of service, and may be subject to minimum purchase restrictions.
